question: 再度
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Again</kanji> with that <kanji>occurrence</kanji>? That occurrence has now happened <vocabulary>again</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Just remember that there's a <ja>い</ja> hiding in there!
